title: Luxury 4-Bedroom Duplex
shortDesc: Stunning duplex with private pool, BQ, and 24/7 power in a serene estate.
description: This exquisitely finished 4-bedroom duplex sits within one of Lekki Phase 1's most sought-after gated estates. The property boasts an open-plan living area flooded with natural light, marble finishes throughout, a fully fitted western kitchen, and a private swimming pool. The compound includes a boys' quarter, 2-car garage, and diesel generator. Perfect for discerning families seeking the very best of Lagos island living.

title: Modern 3-Bedroom Apartment
shortDesc: Contemporary serviced apartment with ocean views and top-tier amenities.
description: Nestled in the heart of Victoria Island, this contemporary 3-bedroom serviced apartment offers breathtaking ocean views and access to world-class amenities. Features include a fully fitted kitchen with high-end appliances, ensuite bathrooms with Italian fittings, dedicated parking space, and access to a rooftop lounge, gym, and swimming pool. An ideal investment or primary residence for the urban professional.

title: Commercial Office Space
shortDesc: Premium open-plan office space in Ikoyi's prime commercial district.
description: This premium open-plan office space on the 4th floor of a grade-A building in Ikoyi is ideal for forward-thinking companies. With 350sqm of flexible workspace, floor-to-ceiling windows, a fitted boardroom, reception area, and kitchenette, this space is ready to impress clients from day one. The building offers 24/7 security, central air conditioning, lifts, and ample parking.

title: Cozy 2-Bedroom Flat
shortDesc: Well-maintained flat with a spacious compound in a calm, central neighborhood.
description: A well-maintained 2-bedroom flat located in the calm and central Surulere neighbourhood. The property sits within a clean compound with a large garden, CCTV cameras, and a reliable borehole water supply. The flat features modern tiling, a functional kitchen, and a spacious living area. Perfect for young professionals or small families seeking comfort on a reasonable budget.

title: 5-Bedroom Detached Mansion
shortDesc: Ultra-luxury waterfront mansion with bespoke finishes on Banana Island.
description: An architectural masterpiece situated on the prestigious Banana Island, this 5-bedroom detached mansion redefines luxury living. The property features a cinema room, wine cellar, private gym, infinity pool overlooking the lagoon, and a 3-car underground garage. Every detail has been meticulously curated — from the Italian marble staircases to the smart home automation system. This is Lagos living at its absolute finest.

title: 3-Bedroom Terrace House
shortDesc: Modern terrace in a gated estate with excellent road access and estate amenities.
description: This beautifully finished 3-bedroom terrace house is located in one of Ajah's emerging premium estates. The estate boasts excellent road access via the Lekki-Epe Expressway, 24/7 security, a children's play area, and a recreational park. The property itself features quality finishes, a fitted kitchen, ensuite bedrooms, a private garden, and two dedicated parking spaces.

title: Studio Apartment
shortDesc: Compact, modern studio ideal for young professionals and tech workers.
description: A sleek, compact studio apartment in the vibrant Yaba district — Lagos's growing tech and creative hub. Perfect for young professionals, the studio features a combined living and sleeping area, a modern fitted kitchenette, and a clean shower room. The building offers fast fiber-optic internet, shared co-working space, and rooftop access.

title: Land (1,000 sqm) — C of O
shortDesc: Prime dry land with full C of O title in rapidly developing Epe corridor.
description: A prime 1,000 sqm dry land with a clean Certificate of Occupancy (C of O) title, located along the rapidly developing Epe axis. Perfect for residential development, commercial use, or investment. The area is witnessing rapid infrastructure development including the Lekki Free Zone road network. This is an excellent opportunity to acquire titled land at a competitive price in a growth corridor.
